Application.featuresString: PROVISIONING, SYNC_PROVISIONING, PASSWORD, ENABLE, SEARCH, UNSTRUCTURED_TARGETS
Application.name: Google Apps - Direct

AttributeDefinition.name: objectID
AttributeDefinition.Description: Unique ID of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: primaryEmail
AttributeDefinition.Description: Primary E-mail ID of user.

AttributeDefinition.name: name
AttributeDefinition.Description: Full name of the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: isAdmin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Is user an administrator.

AttributeDefinition.name: isDelegatedAdmin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Is user a delegated administrator.

AttributeDefinition.name: lastLoginTime
AttributeDefinition.Description: Last login time of user.

AttributeDefinition.name: suspended
AttributeDefinition.Description: Is user suspended.

AttributeDefinition.name: suspensionReason
AttributeDefinition.Description: Reason for suspension.

AttributeDefinition.name: changePasswordAtNextLogin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user is forced to change password at next login.

AttributeDefinition.name: ipWhitelisted
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicate if user's IP address is white listed.

AttributeDefinition.name: ims
AttributeDefinition.Description: The user's Instant Messenger (IM) accounts.

AttributeDefinition.name: emails
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of the user's E-mail addresses.

AttributeDefinition.name: externalIds
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of external IDs for the user, such as an employee or network ID.

AttributeDefinition.name: relations
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of the user's relationships to other users.

AttributeDefinition.name: addresses
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of the user's addresses.

AttributeDefinition.name: organizations
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of organizations the user belongs to

AttributeDefinition.name: phones
AttributeDefinition.Description: A list of the user's phone numbers.

AttributeDefinition.name: aliases
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of the user's alias E-mail addresses.

AttributeDefinition.name: nonEditableAliases
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of the user's non-editable alias E-mail addresses.

AttributeDefinition.name: customerId
AttributeDefinition.Description: The customer ID to retrieve all account users.

AttributeDefinition.name: orgUnitPath
AttributeDefinition.Description: The full path of the parent organization associated with the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: isMailboxSetup
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user's Google mailbox is created.

AttributeDefinition.name: includeInGlobalAddressList
AttributeDefinition.Description: Indicates if the user's profile is visible in Global Address List when the contact sharing feature is enabled for the domain.

AttributeDefinition.name: thumbnailPhotoUrl
AttributeDefinition.Description: Photo Url of the user

AttributeDefinition.name: contacts
AttributeDefinition.Description: Contacts

AttributeDefinition.name: delegatedAdmins
AttributeDefinition.Description: Delegated administrators of a user.

AttributeDefinition.name: Groups
AttributeDefinition.Description: Groups connected to the user.

AttributeDefinition.name: name
AttributeDefinition.Description: Name of the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: nonEditableAliases
AttributeDefinition.Description: List of the group's non-editable alias E-mail addresses that are outside of the account's primary domain or sub domains. These are functioning E-mail addresses used by the group. This is a read-only property.

AttributeDefinition.name: objectID
AttributeDefinition.Description: ID of group

AttributeDefinition.name: description
AttributeDefinition.Description: Description of the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: adminCreated
AttributeDefinition.Description: Whether it is created by administrator.

AttributeDefinition.name: aliases
AttributeDefinition.Description: Group aliases.

AttributeDefinition.name: email
AttributeDefinition.Description: Group E-mail address.

AttributeDefinition.name: directMembersCount
AttributeDefinition.Description: Number of group members.

AttributeDefinition.name: whoCanJoin
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permissions to join the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: whoCanViewMembership
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permissions to view membership.

AttributeDefinition.name: whoCanViewGroup
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permissions to view group.

AttributeDefinition.name: whoCanInvite
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permissions to invite members.

AttributeDefinition.name: allowExternalMembers
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if Google Apps users external to your account can view or become members of this group.

AttributeDefinition.name: whoCanPostMessage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Permissions to post messages to the group.

AttributeDefinition.name: allowWebPosting
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if any member allowed to post to the group web forum.

AttributeDefinition.name: primaryLanguage
AttributeDefinition.Description: Language tag for a group's primary language.

AttributeDefinition.name: maxMessageBytes
AttributeDefinition.Description: The maximum size of a message.

AttributeDefinition.name: isArchived
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if the contents of the group to be archived.

AttributeDefinition.name: archiveOnly
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if the group to be only archived.

AttributeDefinition.name: messageModerationLevel
AttributeDefinition.Description: Moderation level for messages.

AttributeDefinition.name: spamModerationLevel
AttributeDefinition.Description: Moderation levels for messages detected as spam.

AttributeDefinition.name: replyTo
AttributeDefinition.Description: The default reply to a message is sent here.

AttributeDefinition.name: customReplyTo
AttributeDefinition.Description: An E-mail address used when replying to a message.

AttributeDefinition.name: sendMessageDenyNotification
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if the members are notified if his message is denied by owner.

AttributeDefinition.name: defaultMessageDenyNotificationText
AttributeDefinition.Description: Text sent to the message's author as part of rejection notification.

AttributeDefinition.name: showInGroupDirectory
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if group is listed in the Groups directory.

AttributeDefinition.name: allowGoogleCommunication
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean allowing Google to contact group administrators.

AttributeDefinition.name: membersCanPostAsTheGroup
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if members can post using the group E-mail address.

AttributeDefinition.name: messageDisplayFont
AttributeDefinition.Description: Default message's display font.

AttributeDefinition.name: includeInGlobalAddressList
AttributeDefinition.Description: A Boolean indicating if group is included in the Global Address List

AttributeDefinition.name: MANAGERS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Managers of a group.

AttributeDefinition.name: OWNERS
AttributeDefinition.Description: Owners of a group
